description: List trucker invoice payments from QuickBooks.
permissions: Requires an authenticated user with visibility to the requested trucker payments; access is scoped to truckers visible to the user and brokers with QuickBooks enabled, and only one QuickBooks realm can be queried per request.
validation_notes: Either --trucker-id or --trucker is required to scope QuickBooks payments. When filtering by trucker_id, the truckers must belong to a single QuickBooks integration (otherwise the request is rejected).

flags.name: --trucker-id
flags.description: Filter by trucker ID (required; scopes QuickBooks company)
flags.validation: Required unless --trucker is provided; at least one of --trucker-id or --trucker must be set. Example: --trucker-id 123.

flags.name: --trucker
flags.validation: Required unless --trucker-id is provided; at least one of --trucker-id or --trucker must be set. Example: --trucker 123.
